name: Retro Rider
description:
Retro Rider is a first person beat game set in a Retro Neon world.
Vibe like its the 80's and have a nostalgia trip as you travel down the highway lights flashing overhead.

Weave inbetween traffic generated to any loaded .WAV song, with real time environmental visualizers to help immerse you in the world and the music.

Pick any song, Pump the gas and ride in this Neon-Retro rhythm game, welcome to Retro Rider.
